column4: hello, how can I set the correct path variable for adobe acrobat?
adobe acrobat doesn't start, it seems that i have to set the correct path enviroment environment
you realize that is in the repositories right?
if you can remove that and then do sudo apt-get install acroread, everything will be taken care for you
i just installed the new 7.04 beta and there is no acroread listed
ok well then, here is what I would do, sudo ln -s "/usr/local/Adobe/Acrobat 7.0/acroread" /usr/local/bin/acroread
then it should be in the path
thanks, i'll give it a try
